Package org.eclipse.graphiti.pattern.config

Interface IPatternConfiguration

All Known Subinterfaces:
IColorConfiguration, IIndentConfiguration, IMinimumSizeConfiguration
public interface IPatternConfiguration
The tag interface IPatternConfiguration. Can be used to reference any kind of configuration data within a AbstractPattern.
